attributes.action: LNER staff member injured in the attack 1st November to get the George Cross
attributes.additional_details: Because acts of bravery like this are what it is for.
attributes.background: Recognise the fact a member of staff went above and beyond to protect the public at their own risk, with no requirement to do so, displaying gallantry in the spirit of the award.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that ask for someone to be given an honour, or have an honour taken away.

The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
